Headline: Harlem-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Clinton. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Harlem-bound Green Line trains are running with residual delays following earlier police activity at Clinton.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Michigan/Wacker
ShortDescription: 66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Columbus, South Water, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted via Chicago, Columbus, South Water, and Michigan due to, street blockage near Michigan/Wacker.

Allow extra travel time.
